page.title: 07St Pauls Church Parkend
page.content: The vicar, since 1975, is the Reverend Felix Watkins who with his wife Peggy lives in the near by vicarage . As well as the church he looks after a daughter Church in Yorkly assisted by the Reverend George Battan, a non- stipendiary curate .There are 2 services and one mid week and ona saturday morning.On average there are 40-50 in the congregation sunday mornings.The main event of 1985 has been the complete re-roofing of the Church mainly untouched since it was built in 1822.Because of its unique architecture grants towards the cost have been obtained from Goverment and volutary bodies, but over half has been raised by money raising events in the community and from money loaned by parishioners.The total cost of the repairs was Â£18,500 and took 4 months to complete.
